attributes.action: Link MP's pay increases to Public Workers pay increases.
attributes.additional_details:
Over the last few years with austerity, the public sector has been passed over time and again, yet MP's awarded themselves several in the same time.
I want this to cease.
MP's work for the public, therefore should be part of the public sector workers.
attributes.background:
MP's would not be allowed to give themselves a pay increase of more than the Public Sector Workers pay rise percentage.
If MP's can't give an inflation related pay rise to Public Workers, then they wouldn't be able to award themselves a pay rise either.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
